title: What's for lunch?
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, David Ferris, Rob McCubbin, Trevor Lunn and Channel 7 for Curriculum Branch, Ministry of Education
brief_description: Panel discussion about nutrition in schools including scenes from actual classrooms, where panelists Phillip Hughes and Anne Keogh discuss a good food “Pyramid” with children at a Victorian primary school.
